CONVERSATION GROUP: BK revised from "Why return to the past? We have many more exciting things in our future."

BK used mentor instead of leadership to avoid duplicate use of word in sentence BK revised : "They singled me out and began training me for leadership. That's why I was in the other caravan, and that's why I was captured, rather than killed. "
BK rephrased from "They saw the others deferring to me and assumed I was the field leader. They threw me in that cell, tortured and beat me, starved me, until there was almost nothing left. "
BK revised from "Thank all the gods that will listen that you arrived when you did. I would still have made my escape, but I would probably have died in the attempt."
BK added zealous BK revise "I would have taken many out with me, but Jessia would likely have cut me stem to stern."
BK revised fro 'Well, yes. And once he knew I was fine, he would immediately launch into an angry rant about how I should have done this, or I shouldn't have done that. He was such a sweetheart."

BK Wotc Tweak Neveriwnter Forest -> Neverwinter Wood
BK cut ", on the road from Neverwinter" -> seemed to indicate two places, didn't seem necessary
BK revised from "They did. We all felt a need to go our separate ways, in case the elves came hunting for us. I disappeared into the Neverwinter Forest, surviving on my wits... and my wiles... until the day Belamy found me, on the road from Neverwinter."

BK revised from "He told me of a guild called the Burning Dawn. He said they would train us, equip us, pay us... feed us. And it sounded too good to be true. But I could tell my dear brother was sick and starving, and so I agreed to join him in the Order."
BKmerged the end of this sentence with the start of the next.

BK was: "The elves of the Eldeth Veluuthra found us. They had sworn to clear the Forest of all humans, to return it to a more pure state. We had a tiny problem with that. So we fought, and as things tend to go with elves, they won." blended it with the prior sentence

BK was: "Not long after we left home, we got separated. By which I mean, Belamy wanted to go to Waterdeep and become a drunk, while I wished to become a ranger and a scout. So he went to town, and I disappeared into the Ardeep Forest."
BK was "And much to my complete lack of surprise, Belamy was a complete success at being a drunk, and a total failure at anything else. It's... rather sad to think of it now."
Bk cut " in the park" because it sounded modern + I reordred the sentences, moving the 'leaving' to the end

elf friend -> Illydia
After the Dalanir Reveal

BK WOTC fiend -> succubus
BK replaced second "fiend" with "her" [I believe Madelith is female]
BK rephrased "if a friendly drow is the weirdest thing we have to ally ourselves with."

BK I cut ". We couldn't wait to get out of there and blaze our own paths." because a couple lines down she says Belamy was the one who suggested the leave. But this cut sentence hinted that they were both itching to leave.
BK was: "Perhaps we could change the subject? Belamy's an... emotional subject for me, and I'm not an attractive crier. "
BK tweaking along the lines of WOTC request Oh, do I? Well. I think we can probably find ways to make it up to you... if you use your imagination. Perhaps when all this is over?

BK revised: "While I was living among the rangers of the Ardeep Forest, I discovered that our band had been charged with protecting the Infernal Stone. We had strength of numbers, and we moved around a lot. The relic was safe with us."

Bk revised from "I became... close... with Elitha Windroot, the leader of our band. She was smart, sleek, powerful... and she kept the stone around her neck at all times. I begged her to bury it somewhere or to send it away. Anything to keep her safe."

BK also added "before her death" because this line can be reached without hitting the line where Bryn explains that bit.
BK revised from: Elitha had hidden the Stone, and she never even told me where it was. But I feel strongly that she would have wanted me to find it and keep it safe... and she certainly wouldn't want it in the possession of that succubus whore.
BK revised to avoid " if there's time" because it is in next line
BK tweaking sentence, and last :"Then we find out who has the Infernal Stone, and take it before Madelith can get to it."
BK revised from "Why return to the past? We have many more exciting things in our future."
